Text: Thomas Cook ceased trading in the early hours of Monday after failing to secure a last-ditch rescue deal. About 9,000 staff in the UK face redundancy.
Cause: Thomas Cook ceased trading in the early hours of Monday after failing to secure a last-ditch rescue deal.
Effect: About 9,000 staff in the UK face redundancy.
Sentence: <e1>Thomas Cook ceased trading in the early hours of Monday after failing to secure a last-ditch rescue deal.</e1> <e2>About 9,000 staff in the UK face redundancy.</e2>
